wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
Ka fooŋ wa seebi a leɛore lɛ wulo ka fo sagɛɛ ka [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use Terms of Use], ane fo la sagɛɛ sagebo meŋa ka fo na barɛɛ fo toma ko [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ CC BY-SA 4.0 License] ane a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL].
Fo sagɛɛ ka a hyperlink bee URL eeɛ ko a yɛlɛ maaloo goɔloŋ.
wikimedia-torblock-blocked: A fo IP bambo magere, $1, eɛ la [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tor_(network) Tor] yiibu tuobuzie. Maale emmo yineŋ Tor taa la beɛgebo ka neɛ zaa ta sãã o. Ka yɛlɛ yaga nyabo aneŋ wulibu ko noba mine naŋ tona a toma, kaa a [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/No_open_proxies no open proxies] tendaa zaa yɛlɛ.
